# Simulated Scenarios

```{r}
vec <- c(rep(50, times = 10), rep(c(95, 5), times = 5), rep(100, times = 10))
set.seed(1)
noise <- round(runif(30, min = -4, max = 4))

mat <- matrix(
  vec + noise,
  nrow =  10,
  ncol = 3,
  dimnames = list(
    paste("Gene", toupper(letters[1:10])), c("Sample 1", "Sample 2", "Sample 3")
  )
)

top_anno <- HeatmapAnnotation(
  sample = anno_block(
    gp = gpar(fill = "lightgray", col = "lightgray"),
    labels = c("Sample 1", "Sample 2", "Sample 3"),
    labels_gp = gpar(col = "black", fontsize = 15),
    height = unit(10, "mm")
  )
)

col_range <- c(min(mat), (min(mat) + max(mat)) / 2, max(mat))
draw(
  Heatmap(
    mat,
    name = "Gene Expression",
    col = colorRamp2(col_range, colors = c("blue", "white", "red")),
    cluster_rows = FALSE,
    cluster_columns = FALSE,
    show_column_names = FALSE,
    top_annotation = top_anno,
    column_split = seq(3),
    column_title = "Hypothetical Raw Gene Count by Sample Matrix",
    rect_gp = gpar(col = "black", lwd = 0.5),
    column_gap = unit(1, units = "mm"),
    row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
    column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 18),
    row_names_side = "left",
    heatmap_legend_param = list(
      labels_gp = gpar(fontsize = 14), title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
      border = "lightgrey", title_position = "topcenter",
      grid_height = unit(4, "mm"), direction = "horizontal"
    )
  ),
  heatmap_legend_side = "top"
)

gene_sets <- list(
  `Gene Set X` = rownames(mat), `Gene Set Y` = rownames(mat)[1:5]
)
gene_sets

out <- vector("list", length = 6)
names(out) <- c(
  "GSVA", "ssGSEA", "ssGSEA Normalised", "PLAGE", "Z-score", "GeneFunnel"
)

tmp <- gsvaParam(mat, gene_sets)
out[[1]] <- gsva(tmp, verbose = FALSE)

tmp <- ssgseaParam(mat, gene_sets, normalize = FALSE)
out[[2]] <- gsva(tmp, verbose = FALSE)

tmp <- ssgseaParam(mat, gene_sets)
out[[3]] <- gsva(tmp, verbose = FALSE)

tmp <- zscoreParam(mat, gene_sets)
out[[4]] <- gsva(tmp, verbose = FALSE)

tmp <- plageParam(mat, gene_sets)
out[[5]] <- gsva(tmp, verbose = FALSE)

tmp <- Matrix(mat, sparse = TRUE)
out[[6]] <- calculateScores(
  tmp, row_names = rownames(tmp), gene_ids = gene_sets
)
colnames(out[[6]]) <- colnames(tmp)
rownames(out[[6]]) <- names(gene_sets)
```

```{r, fig.width = 5, fig.height = 3}
top_anno <- HeatmapAnnotation(
  sample = anno_block(
    gp = gpar(fill = "lightgray", col = "lightgray"),
    labels = c("S1", "S2", "S3"),
    labels_gp = gpar(col = "black", fontsize = 15),
    height = unit(10, "mm")
  )
)

for (i in seq_along(out)) {
  col_range <- c(
    min(out[[i]]), (min(out[[i]]) + max(out[[i]])) / 2, max(out[[i]])
  )
  if (!all(is.na(col_range))) {
    ht <- draw(
      Heatmap(
        out[[i]],
        name = "Gene Set Score",
        col = colorRamp2(col_range, colors = c("blue", "white", "red")),
        cluster_rows = FALSE,
        cluster_columns = FALSE,
        show_column_names = FALSE,
        top_annotation = top_anno,
        column_split = seq(3),
        column_title = names(out)[[i]],
        rect_gp = gpar(col = "black", lwd = 0.5),
        column_gap = unit(1, units = "mm"),
        row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 16),
        column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 18),
        row_names_side = "left",
        heatmap_legend_param = list(
          labels_gp = gpar(fontsize = 14), title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
          border = "lightgrey", title_position = "topcenter",
          grid_height = unit(4, "mm"), direction = "horizontal"
        )
      ),
      heatmap_legend_side = "top",
    )
    ht
  } else {
    ht <- draw(
      Heatmap(
        out[[i]],
        name = "Gene Set Score",
        cluster_rows = FALSE,
        cluster_columns = FALSE,
        show_column_names = FALSE,
        top_annotation = top_anno,
        column_split = seq(3),
        column_title = names(out)[[i]],
        rect_gp = gpar(col = "black", lwd = 0.5),
        column_gap = unit(1, units = "mm"),
        row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 16),
        column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 18),
        row_names_side = "left",
        heatmap_legend_param = list(
          labels_gp = gpar(fontsize = 14), title_gp = gpar(fontsize = 15),
          border = "lightgrey", title_position = "topcenter",
          grid_height = unit(4, "mm"), direction = "horizontal"
        )
      ),
      heatmap_legend_side = "top",
    )
    ht
  }
}
```
